Review_Text: It says Himalaya baby care but the original product says Himalaya Herbal Healthcare.. Delivery time is good. Packing is outstanding. If you closely observe the photo, u can see "" free from""!!!

I Hope This is Original Product. Fingers crossed. Here is my review.- I ordered the item on 18th JULY and received a product manufactured on JULY 2016. [pics attached]- Ordered Himalaya Herbals Baby care and received Himalaya Baby care. [ NON - Herbal ??]- Its really cost effective, good discounts on 400g.- The powder is soft and feels like the herbal one.- The fragrance is different from the herbal one, which I was using earlier. [a noticeable difference if you compare both]- No lumps or hard particles found on the powder.I have attached some pics for reference. Hope it helps someone.

No doubt product is good but the survice is very bad.I ordered the products it was open n the bottle  was half n tacked by a cellotape I m the regular purchaser but God knows the powder in the box is Himalaya or something else n no return option on this product this made me disappointed n think about it again.

Total waste. The Himalaya Baby Powder is a good one with no doubt. But the Product I received was half and used, but just taped over the lid. It's so clear, that must be the used one. I wonder whether it is Himalaya powder or some other powder in.. Don't get fooled by the offer.Packaging was also not so impressive,but received earlier.
Himalaya Herbals Baby Powder best for kids. Do not go for J&J.
The powder wasn't filled completely.Himalaya Herbals Baby Powder (400 gram)It was filled around 65% to 70%. Not sure, whether there was a leakage or something happened with the seller. Felt bad.

Actually this powder for baby but use it regularly by whole family.Reason to selection of this products are following :* It is 100% herbal* Very fine and smooth powder.* pleasant fragrance &cheaper than other product.

I am a big time fan of almost all the beauty or cosmetic range products of this brand. Tried first the baby powder of this range after getting good reviews from friends and it has been 2 months I am loving it so far. I was never a talcum powder person but somehow got addicted to it. Since it is a baby powder it is does not have harsh chemicals and has very nice fragrance. I have huge perspiration sometimes and this leaves me with itching and bad smell (I know it sounds gross but fact of life). This absolutely settles down very problem for me related to sweating. I got this on offer else first time user can try out the smaller one 200gms.

Its my request to buyers please please don't buy this product just for low price otherwise you also in trouble like me.I also want to request amazon please don't sell this product as its different from the original one.

But old product purchased in shop was not. I am not able to return this product in Amazon, but definitely I am not going to use for my baby. I suggest all online buyer careful while i buy baby products. If this was tampered to remove the content of it is fine, but what if mixed with some cheep product with it!! Just a thought

In this article, I will explain some of the Best Baby Powder available in the Indian market and its prices. Baby powder consists of ingredient such as talc which may be sometimes cause problem to infant when inhaled or swallowed. It is mainly used to remove diaper rash in infant and many types of rashes on infant tender skin. The below mentioned brands of baby powder will surely helps in preventing rashes to your infant soft skin.
I have always trusted Himalaya for my child. It gives him protection against sweat along with good aroma. Very nice

As of all himalaya products this was also a great option as baby powder the smell,flow of powder,colour everything is quite natural and free of chemicals which is good when compared to chemical containg powders like j&j etc,i have bought it for some 8 to 10 times,got it at 80 rupees for 400g in lightening deal once.

I love this product and rated it 5, since no other product can match this product or come close to it in India. Since, Himalaya is a specialization in baby products and it is offered at a very economical price and well distributed by Amazon India . Perfect combination and value for money

Im extremely happy with this purchase, its an excellent baby powder. Himalaya baby products are good and proud to say its an Indian product. Better dont buy 400 gm pack which lasts for very long time and fragrance turns milder.Pros:1) Softer than Johnson powder.2) Superb fragrance (once again, comparing to johnson powder)3) Stays on baby's skin for long time.Thus helps to keep baby's skin fresh.4) Reasonable price.5) Cute & nice (white & green) package.Cons:1)Granular particles are found which is the only one demerit .I would rate it 4.5 stars!!

Himalaya herbals baby powder uses natural products when compare with other baby powders. In the beginning we faced some skin disease problem for my new born baby by using famous baby product powder &  soap. At that movement we stopped and changed to use Himalaya, we never faced it again. Thanks for Himalaya. And finally we also changed the soap, baby moisturizer, shampoo, massage oil as well with Himalaya Herbals. For babies Himalaya providing very good products. If you have a doubt use those products and come to know the truth. Thanks for Amazon for providing such services.

It appears that Cloudtail/Amazon is selling either old stock or low quality imitation products. When this powder was used on the child's body, it left chalky marks without spreading evenly like the previous ones I've purchased directly from Himalaya stores.I'm very highly disappointed with this quality, & am totally unappreciative of what a reputed brand like Amazon is selling to customers. What makes it worse is that it is a product for children...totally unacceptable.

The headline is himalaya healthcare on genuine product..But  it was Himalaya Babycare on the powder which I received. There are other spelling mistakes too..And when did Khus Grass change into Khus Khus???God Only Knows..As far as I know, both r dfrnt..Nd how come poppy seeds are used in baby powder!!God only knowsWl never buy again..

I did not buy this from amazon but this review will help others.  Powder is good but results in skin darkening. My baby girl suffered 4m skin darkening only on areas where i applied this powder.
